meanings.sent1: The farmer's field was cloddy, with lumpy soil everywhere.
meanings.sent2: Her shoes were cloddy after walking through the muddy field.
meanings.sent3: The cloddy ground made it hard for the kids to play hopscotch.
meanings.sent4: The cloddy texture of the cake made it difficult to cut smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The cloddy appearance of the clouds signaled an incoming storm.

meanings.definition: Covered in or composed of clods.
meanings.sent1: The cloddy path was rough to walk on.
meanings.sent2: The cloddy rocks made the garden look untidy.
meanings.sent3: She found a cloddy surprise in her shoe after gardening.
meanings.sent4: The cloddy ground felt like walking on little pebbles.
meanings.sent5: The cloddy soil stuck to his boots as he walked through the field.
